sqlMap.statement: SELECT ROWNO AS "ROWNO" , EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISEVRINSTNCNAME" , EAISEVRIP AS "EAISEVRIP" , SEVRLSNPORTNAME AS "SEVRLSNPORTNAME" , FLOVRSEVRNAME AS "FLOVRSEVRNAME" , HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY EAISEVRINSTNCNAME) ROWNO, EAISEVRINSTNCNAME, EAISEVRIP, SEVRLSNPORTNAME, FLOVRSEVRNAME, HOSTNAME FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03 ) ORGTABLE WHERE ROWNO BETWEEN #startNum# AND #endNum#
SELECT EAISEVRINSTNCNAME AS "EAISVRINSTNM", EAISEVRIP AS "EAISVRIP", SEVRLSNPORTNAME AS "EAISVRLSNPORT", FLOVRSEVRNAME AS "FAILOVERSVRNM", HOSTNAME AS "HOSTNAME" FROM $schemaId$.TSEAIEP03 LIMIT 1;
